---
name: "Feature Request"
about: "I have a suggestion!"
labels: "enhancement"
---

STOP! Your feature request may have already been requested. Please search on the [issue tracker](https://github.com/pointybeard/api_framework/issues) before creating a new one.

## Feature Request

**Is your feature request related to a problem?**
Description of what the problem is. E.g., I have an issue when [...]

**Describe the solution you would like**
A description of what you want to happen.

**Describe alternatives you have considered**
Alternative solutions or features you've considered.
